meanings.definition: The quality or state of being grandiose.
meanings.sent1: Her grandiosenesses in planning parties always impresses everyone.
meanings.sent2: The grandiosenesses of the castle left visitors in awe.
meanings.sent3: The grandiosenesses of his storytelling made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The grandiosenesses of the mountain peak took our breath away.
meanings.sent5: The grandiosenesses of the fireworks display lit up the night sky.

meanings.definition: The grandiose quality or state of being grandiose.
meanings.sent1: The grandiosenesses of her ideas were unmatched in the company.
meanings.sent2: His grandiosenesses in speech always captivated the audience.
meanings.sent3: The grandiosenesses of the cake made it the talk of the town.
meanings.sent4: The grandiosenesses of the storm were felt throughout the city.
meanings.sent5: The grandiosenesses of the artwork drew crowds from far and wide.
